title.rendered: 289 How to Source for Amazon – Overview of our Process

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 20:31 — 18.8MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Sourcing great products is clearly vital for a physical product based business.

That said, it’s vital that it’s part of a logical overall business building process.

Michael covers this and more including:

  • Why sourcing can’t save you from poor market research
  • Why having a clear target market is critical
  • Why the overall business building process is more important than any single part of it.
  • What the main focus needs to be of your sourcing process

Links mentioned:

Shawn Twing

Private Label Process (overview and pre-order offer info)

Our Free 4-part Video overview of Amazon business building:

Private Label Class

Watch How to Source for Amazon – Overview of our Process
